general.description: A site demonstrating the combination Material-UI, React and Next.js

templates.thisIsTheXExample: This is an example of using dynamic routing. The query parameter is "%s".

state.positive: You are giving consent to cookies.
state.negative: You haven't given consent to cookies.

example.thisIsNullExample: This is an example of using dynamic routing, although there is no query parameter.

cookieConsentSnackbar.message: This website uses cookies in order to provide a faster, more customized user experience. Is it okay if we proceed in using cookies?
